item.title: Medieval Helpdesk
item.description: “The human brain’s capacity doesn’t change from one year to the next, so the insights from studying human behaviour have a very long shelf life. What was difficult for users twenty years ago continues to be difficult today.” - Jakob Nielsen Don’t Make Me Think! was first published 18 years ago, and if you’re just hearing about it now, it’s tempting to think: “Is it still relevant?” Well, yes.
